issue.title: [Java] Implement/test UnionFixedSizeListWriter for FixedSizeListVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6079). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now we have two list vectors: `ListVector` and `FixedSizeListVector`.

`ListVector` has already implemented UnionListWriter for writing data, however, `FixedSizeListVector` doesn't have this yet and seems the only way for users to write data is getting inner vector and set value manually.

Implement a writer for `FixedSizeListVector` is useful in some cases.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6079?focusedCommentId=16904534) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4973
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4973>
